rule: If the chatbot is unable to process or determine the part of speech for the provided word, the output must not be "CantAnswer"; it must instead provide an explanation or reasoning in multi-line text.
input: sentence: Excessive token #problems handled., word: TokenNotExist
complianceText:
The chatbot output consists of a single word, "Unknown". The description specifies that the chatbot should return only the part-of-speech tag, or "Unknown" if the word cannot be tagged, or "CantAnswer" if unable to tag. Since "Unknown" is a valid tag according to the description, the chatbot complies with the rules.
OK
